text: Joseph Manuel Alexander Fernando ( Æleksænḍar Pranāndu; 25 August 194029 April 2020) was a Sri Lankan actor and stunt director. He was known for his villain roles. Fernando acted in over 120 Sinhala movies. He was born in Kotahena, Ceylon. His best known roles were in Ahas Gauwa, Christhu Charithaya and in Supiri Balawatha. Fernando died on 29 April 2020 in Colombo, Sri Lanka at the age of 79.Veteran actor, Alexander Fernando passed away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 deaths Category:1940 births Category:Sri Lankan movie actors Category:Stunt performers
title: Alexander Fernando
